thread.section_title: ezCater Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ezCater | www.ezcater.com | 6 of 121
thread.title: Lynn L

author: Lynn L
title: Lynn L
text: I just happened upon this website a few months ago and have been using it ever since. What a huge time saver trying to find restaurants in my area who deliver or cater. I order food monthly for work and this site has been such a blessing. It's also nice that you don't have to sign for the delivery and the website is very user friendly. The best thing is you can use it all across the US! I shared it with my co-workers across Virginia and they were thrilled. I only hope more restaurants/caterers sign up with ezCater as they would get my business.
